data.name: Absenteeism10
data.value: 1- Enter Absence Codes, Names and Warning Limits. Students Exceeding the Warning Limit are Colored in the Total Absenteeism Section.

data.name: Absenteeism11
data.value: 2- Select Only "Unexcused Absence" Code From Defined (Letter) Codes

data.name: Absenteeism12
data.value: 3- While entering the code, checks are made according to the codes you have determined.

data.name: Absenteeism13
data.value: 4- Lowercase Letter of the Defined (Letter)Code is Calculated as Half Day/Hour.

data.name: AccountCodeMsg2
data.value: Account codes are defined as follows.

data.name: AccountCodeMsg3
data.value: You can prevent the status from appearing in queries by making the status passive.

data.name: AccountingExcel1
data.value: 1- Information of the Accounting Receipt is Entered.

data.name: AccountingExcel2
data.value: 2- Information is Displayed with the Start Button.

data.name: AccountingExcel3
data.value: 3-Column Header is Used to Group the Information.

data.name: AccountingExcel4
data.value: 4- Information is Transferred to Excel with the Excel Button.

data.name: AccountingMsg12
data.value: 5- Enter the "Debit" or "Credit" amount of the relevant account.

data.name: AccountingMsg13
data.value: 6- Your accounting accounts should always be in balance.

data.name: AccountingMsg14
data.value: 7- Example; If 10.000 Debit entries are made to 100 CASH DESK accounts, 10,000 should be entered in the Credit record of the relevant account.

data.name: AccountingMsg2
data.value: 1- Receipt Type, Receipt Date and Receipt Number are entered

data.name: AccountingMsg3
data.value: 2- Press the "New Receipt No" button to enter a new receipt.

data.name: AccountingMsg4
data.value: 3- Use the "Check Receipt" button to see the blank slips skipped.

data.name: AccountingMsg5
data.value: 4- Click the "Balance Check" button to see the slips skipped before the Debit Balance is equalized. You can edit your controls by doing this section.

data.name: AccountingMsg6
data.value: 5- You can close the receipts with the balance of Debit and Receivables with the button "Processing Receipts" You can open a new page for a new receipt entry.

data.name: AccountingMsg8
data.value: 1- In the "Accounting code" entry, make your selection as the sub-account of the account, If the account name is predefined, it will appear on the screen.

data.name: AccountingMsg9
data.value: 2- If desired, "Code" entry is made, this code entry can be defined in the fixed parameters entry section. You get the detailed filtering feature of various lists according to these sub-details entered.

data.name: AskForConfirmation
data.value: Ask for Confirmation on Every Billing Statement

data.value: Backup Your Internal or External Drives.

data.name: BackupMsg2

data.value: - Student Registration Is Put Into CANCEL Status.

data.name: CancellationMsg103
data.value: - Cancel: Cancels Registration, Previously issued Check / Note etc. Cancels.

data.value: - Following (Cancellation): Cancels Registration, Check / Note etc. Included in the lists.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg1
data.value: -Unpaid debts. Installments will be deleted and operations will be done as follows.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg12
data.value: - Student School Change is made in the New Semester.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg13
data.value: - Students whose fees are not entered can change schools.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg14
data.value: - If the student registration meets these conditions, you can choose an Institution/School.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg15
data.value: - "School Change Will Be Made for This Student", By pressing the OK button in the question, the operation is applied.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg2
data.value: .Old debts. Will be added CREDIT to Relevant Accounts. Will be added DEBT to Student Accounts.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg3
data.value: .New debts. Will be added DEBIT to Relevant Accounts. Will be added CREDIT to Student Accounts.

data.name: ChangeInStudentMsg4
data.value: -Returns processing, Is Made After The Change Process.

data.name: Chat01
data.value: The purpose of this software, which is prepared as an in-house messaging system, various communications needed while using the program with the institution management, at the same time, the communication needs of users is to be resolved as quickly as possible.

data.name: Chat02
data.value: Messaging system; It works in real time while messaging each other, The message you sent is displayed with the message icon in the users section on the left side of the message screen of the relevant user, If the message system is not open, the function icon under the user picture in the main menu of the program will be changed and the user is warned.

data.name: Chat03
data.value: File transfer functions are not added due to system security and Virus and similar threats. You can use software that provides email or transfer service for such needs.

data.value: Checks And Bonds By Positions Detailed

data.value: Enter a Short Name for the School/Institution. (To be used in Accounting etc. Transactions)

data.name: CreditCardMsg1
data.value: - There is a "Maturity Day" Option for Credit Card Transactions.

data.name: CreditCardMsg2
data.value: - If this field is entered as 30 or 45 Days, Installments will be arranged according to 30 or 45 Day Maturities. (Minimum day entry is limited to 5.)

data.name: CurrentCardMsg1
data.value: 1- Go to the Chart of Accounts Section and select the Current Card Option opposite the Relevant Accounts for Current Card Entry Transactions. If there is no account, define it.

data.name: CurrentCardMsg2
data.value: 2- Selected Accounts will appear as "Name and Accounting Code" in the Upper Left Section of the Current Card Entry Transactions.

data.name: CurrentCardMsg3
data.value: 3- Select the Relevant Account and Enter the Authorized Name, Telephone, Other and Invoice Information and Save.

data.name: CurrentCardMsg4
data.value: 4- To perform current registration transactions, simply select the account.

data.name: CurrentCardMsg5
data.value: - These entries are also recorded as accounting vouchers.

data.name: CurrentCardMsg6
data.value: - Therefore, pay attention to the Receipt Date and Receipt Number Entries.

data.name: DiscountMsg
data.value: You can select up to 10 discount types in a list.

data.name: Div1Msg1
data.value: - In this section, you can make a new debt entry to the Student.

data.name: Div1Msg2
data.value: - If the student's invoice planning has been made, do not forget to plan according to the new arrangement.

data.name: Div1SmsMsg1
data.value: 1- SMS. SMS for You to Use Your Transactions. Buy the Credit.

data.name: Div1SmsMsg2

data.name: Div1SmsMsg3
data.value: 3- This information should be entered in the sections above.

data.name: Div1SmsMsg4
data.value: 4- Enter the Title for the Institution to be Used in Sending the SMS.

data.name: Div1SmsMsg6
data.value: 5- SMS After Registering This Information. Credits on Display If it appears, you can start sending your SMS messages.

data.value: If no change is made, the Cash Account is recorded as a debit.

data.value: 4- You can classify your entries according to Colors.

data.value: 5- For coloring work, from the Markers section of the School menu, You can make your changes via the "Student Markers" entries.

data.value: Upload high resolution images for quality images.

data.name: InvoiceBatchMsg100
data.value: Class selection: Select the class to invoice according to the classes.

data.name: InvoiceBatchMsg101
data.value: Invoice date : The date on which the batch invoice will be issued must be entered.

data.name: InvoiceBatchMsg103
data.value: - You can apply invoice printing within a certain number range. For this, the number range must be selected, if not entered, the default number is "10".

data.name: InvoiceBatchMsg104
data.value: - After the invoice printing process is completed, you need to confirm to save the invoice numbers. otherwise, batch invoice printing will be deemed invalid.

data.name: InvoiceDateMsg
data.value: Invoice Date is the Scheduled Date and cannot be changed.

data.name: InvoiceEntry02
data.value: Issued invoices: In this section, pre-cut invoices are displayed on the screen. You can query the invoice by Title or Invoice number as you wish. When the relevant invoice is selected, it is show on the screen with its details.

data.name: InvoiceEntry04
data.value: Invoice no: You can change the corporate invoice numbers from this section.

data.name: InvoiceEntry05
data.value: Invoice type: You can change the corporate invoice type in this section.

data.name: InvoiceEntry07
data.value: In this section, you can enter a new invoice.

data.name: InvoiceEntry08
data.value: You can save invoice contact information and invoice amounts by pressing the SAVE button.

data.name: InvoiceMsg100
data.value: 1- NEW PLAN : It is used to schedule invoices for students. Starting date, Total number of invoices, Detailed, Discounted options are entered. The start button is pressed and the school makes plans for all students.

data.name: InvoiceMsg101
data.value: For a single student: The relevant student is selected and the "Selected student" option is selected and the Start button is pressed.

data.name: InvoiceMsg102
data.value: 2- DETAIL: It shows the student invoices in detail according to the fee details.

data.name: InvoiceMsg103
data.value: 3- UNPLANNED: It is prepared for institutions that do not want to plan. An Unplanned invoice can also be issued to a scheduled student.

data.name: InvoiceMsg104
data.value: 4- STUDENT INVOICES: To issue a PLANNED or UNPLANNED invoice, the relevant invoice is selected and Invoice button is pressed.

data.name: InvoiceMsg105
data.value: After planning, you can delete the records of the student you want, You can issue new invoices.

data.name: InvoiceMsg106
data.value: By deselecting the Active column, you can prevent it from print in the relevant month.

data.name: InvoiceMsg107
data.value: You can change the Unissuedor cut options.

data.name: InvoiceMsg108
data.value: You can access the invoices issued in the previous education period.

data.name: InvoiceMsg2
data.value: 2- Enter the Number of Invoices to be Issued.

data.name: InvoiceMsg3
data.value: 3- Detailed Invoice Option will be detailed as General, Discount and Registration Fee in the invoice. (You Can Change This Option On Student Billing Screen After This Process.)

data.name: InvoiceMsg4
data.value: 4- When issuing the invoice, the option to write the tuition fee in a single item will be marked. (After this process, you can change this option on the Student Billing Screen.)

data.name: InvoiceMsg5
data.value: 5- You can make more than one plan according to the Fees you choose.

data.name: InvoiceMsg6
data.value: 6- Unissued invoices of students whose invoices have been issued are included in the process. (Date should not be changed for this transaction.)

data.name: InvoiceOnDateMsg
data.value: This Option Must Be Selected Before Planning Invoice.

data.name: InvoiceSerialMsg1
data.value: - You can also change the invoice serial numbers from this section

data.name: InvoiceSerialMsg2

data.value: If there is no Tax Number, Enter the ID Number.

data.value: This Program is Used for the New Accounting Period.

data.name: PermissionMsg
data.value: You are not authorized to use this section.

data.name: PositionChangeMsg102
data.value: - By pressing the Edit button, the position change is made.

data.name: PositionChangeMsg103
data.value: - For check/note registration, Entries are made in the allowed fields and a position change is made in the "Status" section.

data.name: PositionChangeMsg104
data.value: - Clicking the Update button completes the process.

data.name: PositionChangeMsg105
data.value: 2- With the Printer Button, lists can be taken according to the positions.

data.name: PreregistrationMessage
data.value: Please press the SAVE button after entering the student and parent information. You will be contacted as soon as possible.

data.name: PrgMsg01
data.value: Brief notes on using the program:

data.name: PrgMsg02
data.value: WHAT TO DO BEFORE STUDENT REGISTRATION

data.name: PrgMsg03
data.value: 1-First, enter the School / Institution information, Fees, E-Mail, E-Invoice, Serial Number and Settings section from the School / Institution information entry.

data.name: PrgMsg04
data.value: 2-In the class definition section, enter the class names and types.

data.name: PrgMsg05
data.value: 3-From the section of fee entries according to classes, Enter the fee schedules to be applied by the School for the relevant semester.

data.name: PrgMsg06
data.value: 4-In the Applied Discounts section, enter the Discount Items Table of the School/Institution.

data.name: PrgMsg07
data.value: 5-Make the Bank Information Entries, Enter the Banks that the Institution Works with in detail. Any bank that works with OTS. Do not forget to enter the Bank and Branch accounts of that bank

data.name: PrgMsg08
data.value: 6-Review the parameters used in the program. If necessary, you can make additions according to your school/institution.

data.name: PrgMsg09
data.value: 7-Enter the details of the School/Institution's vehicle information in the Transportation Entrance Section.

data.name: PrgMsg10
data.value: 8-Edit your institution's current contract with the contract design program or Get help from our company or our dealers.

data.name: PrgMsg11
data.value: 9- Please review the Accounting/Accounting plan entry section, add any accounts you want to add.

data.name: PrgMsg12
data.value: 10- Make your user logins, Specify Username, Password, Working hours and Working fields.

data.name: PrgMsg13
data.value: -Student Entrances, In collection transactions, Cancellation/Change and Refund transactions, Accounting records are processed by the program.

data.name: PrgMsg14
data.value: -The accounting account codes defined in the corporate fixed information entry are taken as reference.

data.name: PrgMsg15
data.value: YOU CAN REGISTER STUDENT AFTER COMPLETING THE PROCESSES CONSISTING OF 10 STAGES

data.name: PrgMsg16
data.value: -Make your student registration by going to the student registration form section.

data.name: PrgMsg17
data.value: -For a good invoice tracking, Create a Batch Invoice plan after student entries.

data.name: PrgMsg18
data.value: -After these steps, you can do all kinds of operations, you can print your lists.

data.name: PrintingWithoutAsking
data.value: All Invoice Printing is done without asking.

data.name: RecordsFoundOnTheSameDateAreListed
data.value: Records found on the same date are listed.

data.name: RefundMsg1
data.value: Which Case Should The Refund Be Made?

data.name: RefundMsg10
data.value: If the payment will be made in CASH, Payee Account-1 Enter Account Code Amount or

data.name: RefundMsg11
data.value: If the refund will be made in Cash, Check, Bond, Enter Account Code Amount.

data.name: RefundMsg13
data.value: - You can use it for the records that will be canceled after the return process.

data.name: RefundMsg2
data.value: - If Collection Process Has Been Made. You can apply for student payments.

data.name: RefundMsg21
data.value: - Top Account should be recorded when recording

data.name: RefundMsg210
data.value: Total debt = Total Fee + Refund Amount

data.name: RefundMsg211
data.value: - Warning: After Billing Plan or After Billing-Changes Made May Cause Inconsistency.

data.name: RefundMsg212
data.value: - Occurring From Student Fee Changes, It Should Be Used In Cases Where The Customer Is Creditor With A Fee Difference.

data.name: RefundMsg22
data.value: - Refund amounts should be recorded in refund section

data.name: RefundMsg221
data.value: 2- The Amount Deducted From The Fee Is Entered As The Refund Amount.

data.name: RefundMsg222
data.value: 3- The Date Of The Amount To Be Refunded Is Entered and The Process Is Completed By Registration.

data.name: RefundMsg23
data.value: - Click Save Button To Start Process After Record Refund Amound

data.name: RefundMsg3
data.value: - Must Be A Pre-Collected MONEY Entry For Refund

data.name: RefundMsg4
data.value: - Amounts to be Refunded From Related Accounts as Cash or Bond, It should be considered as a payment out of the company's cash-desk

data.name: RefundMsg5
data.value: - The Refund Amount, Cannot Be More Than The Total Amount Paid.

data.name: RefundMsg6
data.value: - Debtor Records Must Re-Edit or Reset.

data.name: RefundMsg7
data.value: - After This Procedure All Installments Are Canceled and Exit Process is done.

data.name: SchoolMsg01
data.value: 1- Enter the long Name and short Code and Name of the Institution, the city of the Bill and the Picture or Logo to be used in the Contracts.

data.name: SchoolMsg03
data.value: 3- School Start and End period, Accounting Start and End period dates must be entered.

data.name: SchoolMsg04
data.value: 4- The School/Institution's Service Fees and Student Vehicle Service detailed information are entered.

data.name: SchoolMsg06
data.value: 6- E-Invoice information is entered, the Integrator is selected. (If you do not have any information on this subject, get information from our Company or our Dealers.)

data.name: SchoolMsg07
data.value: 7- There are voucher numbers that the program uses on receipts and issued Checks/Notes. You can edit these numbers as you wish, you can reset them every year if you want.

data.name: SchoolMsg08
data.value: 8- Checks/Bills received from the student are recorded in the Accounting department as a DEBT/CREDIT slip. Accounting account codes used while processing these receipts are taken from this section, you can make changes.

data.name: SchoolMsg09
data.value: 9- Various settings and conveniences are provided in the use of the program. You can change these settings according to your preference.

data.value: Enter at least three letters to search.

data.value: Select Sibling/Group and Press The SUBMIT Button

data.value: Invoice Serial Code(3) Enter as Characters Like NCS. (Invoice Number; Invoice Serial Code(3) + Year(4) + Invoice Serial Number(9) 16 Characters in Total. It is created by the program.)

data.name: SmsEmailMsg1
data.value: Select the Students to whom the message will be sent or tick All.

data.name: SmsEmailMsg2
data.value: Make your choice of sending the message. To "Mobile Phone" or "E-Mail Address"

data.name: SmsEmailMsg4
data.value: Send message : Used for private messages, the message is edited and sent.

data.name: SmsEmailMsg5
data.value: Student birthday message : Message for birthday is arranged and sent.

data.name: SmsEmailMsg6
data.value: Unpaid debt notification : Messages prepared according to the payment status are sent in the student section.

data.name: SmsEmailMsg7
data.value: Total debt statement : Messages prepared according to all payments are sent in the student section.

data.name: SmsEmailMsg8
data.value: Message results : A feedback report is prepared for the sent messages.

data.name: StudentMsg01
data.value: Briefly, How to Register a Student?

data.name: StudentMsg02
data.value: 1- Enter the Student's Name, Surname and other personal information.

data.name: StudentMsg03
data.value: 2- Name, Surname, Class information, Registration status, Registration type are the fields that must be entered.

data.name: StudentMsg04
data.value: 3- Price information is selected or entered (You can enter manually by double-clicking with the mouse)

data.name: StudentMsg041
data.value: -- Fee; For Institutions That Want to Enter Sub-Details;

data.name: StudentMsg042
data.value: -- Fee Details are Entered in the "Fee Entry by Class Type" Table Section in the School Menu.

data.name: StudentMsg043
data.value: -- While logging in as a student, the DETAIL TABLE is automatically displayed in the Fee Items where Fee Details have been entered.

data.name: StudentMsg044
data.value: -- Among the Sub-Detailed Fees Shown, the desired selection is made and the Sub-Fee is selected by pressing the REGISTER Button.

data.name: StudentMsg045
data.value: 4- Discount information, if any, is entered, fee discounts are made and the student's registration amount is adjusted.

data.name: StudentMsg05
data.value: 5- Then, the payment planning of the arranged debt is made, Installment amount, Advance payment etc. By entering the information, the installment table is created according to the maturities.

data.name: StudentMsg06
data.value: 6- By clicking the SAVE button, the student's personal information and fee and installment information are saved.

data.name: StudentMsg08
data.value: - The student's current record is created, you can enter and make transactions in the Collection section.

data.name: StudentMsg09
data.value: - According to the type of debiting made in the student registration, automatic accounting registration is made, Received Check / Promissory Note etc. For payments, DEBT and RECEIVABLE entries are recorded in the Accounting slip.

data.name: StudentMsg10
data.value: - If changes will be made in student fees, "/Change/Change transactions",

data.name: StudentMsg11
data.value: - If a refund will be made, with the "/Change/Return" transactions,

data.name: StudentMsg12
data.value: - If a future-dated refund is to be made, with "/Change/Return transactions (Forward dated)",

data.name: StudentMsg13
data.value: - If cancellations are to be made, you can do so with "/Change/Cancellation".

data.name: StudentRegistrationRenewalFormAndInvoiceInformationList
data.value: Student Registration Renewal Form And Invoice Information List

data.name: StudentRegistrationRenewalFormListSortByClassroomRegistrationNo
data.value: Student Registration Renewal Form List ( Sort By Classroom/Registration No )

data.name: TaxNoNotEntered
data.value: The information required for invoice printing has not been entered. Please complete the missing information.

data.name: TheseInvoiceNumbersWillBePrinted
data.value: These Invoice Numbers Will Be Printed

data.name: TimeZoneLocationMsg
data.value: If the program is used in a different country, get information from our office.

data.name: TooltipId
data.value: Enter the Id and press the control button. (Red=Invalid, Green=Valid number.)

data.name: tooltipMsg2
data.value: Sibling/Group Selection is Made in the Existing Entry, Address Copies are Made When Making a New Registration

data.name: TooltipStudentSerialNumber1
data.value: The registration number is given by the program (Institution / Serial no / Last Registration No)

data.name: TooltipStudentSerialNumber2
data.value: It is used for student registration number

data.name: UsersEntry01
data.value: 1- The desktop picture and other information of the users who will use the program are entered.

data.name: UsersEntry02
data.value: 2- It can change the picture displayed in the program menu. You can choose your own images.

data.name: UsersEntry03
data.value: 3- The start and end times of the working hours are entered. The user can use the program at the entered time intervals.

data.name: UsersEntry04
data.value: 4- Username and password must be entered To the program; You can log in with this information.

data.name: UsersEntry05
data.value: 5- Working areas: The user's workspace is limited by unchecking the program workspaces that you do not want the user to enter or use.

data.name: UsersEntry06
data.value: 6- User status: Active : Can use the program Passive: Can't use the program

data.name: UsersEntry07
data.value: 7- (*) Entries found can be entered by the ADMINISTRATOR.

data.name: UsersEntry08
data.value: 8- Only the Administrator can enter and see the Notes About Personnel Section.

data.name: ValidationError
data.value: Invalid information entry, Please check your entries.

data.name: ValidationError2
data.value: No payment found on the entered date.

data.name: ValidationError3
data.value: No Student Found Between Two Classes Entered

data.name: ValidationError4
data.value: You Cannot Transfer, The Information for the Entered New Period is Available.

data.name: ValidationError5
data.value: Your New Term Information Has Been Transferred, Please Check Your Information.

data.name: ValidationError6
data.value: Transaction Pre-Done, Renew Transaction for Re-Transfer.

data.name: ValidationError7
data.value: Closing for the Old Term, Opening for the New Term Successfully Made.

data.name: ValidationError8
data.value: Your School or Company's E-Invoice Information Has Not Been Entered, Please Enter The Information.

data.name: ValidationError9
data.value: No Entries Found on Entered Date and Receipt No.

data.name: ValidationError33
data.value: No record found for the entered account.

data.name: M109Msg0
data.value: - Those without debt are not included in the normal listing.
